cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 7 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
A standard double room in a character lodge with fully made up beds and home comforts. 
Shared kitchen, bathroom and lounge.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe 3 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Nestled privately in the rainforest, with its own ensuite and tea and toast making facilities. Full Kitchen facilities in Te Ruru Lodge. Romantic Cottage. Queen bed. From the car park its a two minute walk to your accommodation

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard 3 Bed Apartment Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Mamaku Cottage is a self contained studio unit with garden views and a private deck.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 22:59 26th Sep 2025 (NZST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 22:59 26th Sep 2025 (NZST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
